subject: AM Brief: Fri, 31 Jan 2025
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-off. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over Zimbabwe Dollar.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 15:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Predovic - Terry upgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Civis arceo defluo pel sublime suppellex totus trans.
- AFR: Adnuo aperio placeat virtus aliquam ager.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Important: Air Conditioning Maintenance Tonight

subject: Building Update: Scheduled Fire Drill
body:
Dear Occupants,

Please follow instructions from your floor wardens. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Kind regards,
Nathan Wright
